text: Simply put, I find myself converting non-binary masks to binary masks all the time. An addition option to do this automatically would be nice.
title: [ENH] add auto-binarization option to _load_mask_img()

text: Additional detail: this PR concerns masks for which np.unique(mask) > 2.
I think that what you are looking for is `compute_epi_mask`.
Closing as what you are looking for is in another function.
